title: "Apellis Presents Phase 3 Functional Analyses of SYFOVRE™ (pegcetacoplan injection) for Geographic Atrophy"
excerpt: "Apellis Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (Nasdaq: APLS), a global biopharmaceutical company and leader in complement, today announced post hoc analyses from the 24-month, Phase 3 OAKS and DERBY studies evaluating SYFOVRE™ (pegcetacoplan injection) for the treatment of geographic atrophy (GA) secondary to age-related macular degeneration (AMD)."
